text: Pen nɨbi binɨb wog gɨñeb okok, bɨawl nɨbi okok kɨlop pɨlɨkɨl, takaw kɨli ak nɨg dɨl kɨdek gɨnɨmɨb.6.5-8 Kol 3.22-25 Kɨlop yepɨs gɨl wog yokɨp ma gɨnɨmɨb, wog kɨles gɨl gɨtep yɨbɨl gun agɨl gos nɨgɨnɨmɨb. Klays takaw ne nɨg dɨl wog ne gɨtep gɨpɨm tek, bɨawl nɨbi okok abe takaw kɨli nɨg dɨl wog kɨli gɨtep gɨnɨmɨb.
